input_parameters.hint: CCs are only added in public reply

input_parameters.name: reply_type
input_parameters.title: Reply type
input_parameters.hint: Defaults to an internal note if a value is not provided

input_parameters.name: status
input_parameters.title: Status
input_parameters.hint: Defaults to new if a value is not provided

functions.title: Remove tags
functions.description: Remove tags on a ticket without affecting existing ones

input_parameters.name: assignee_id
input_parameters.title: New assignee
input_parameters.hint: Use to assign to a specific agent

input_parameters.name: group_id
input_parameters.title: New group
input_parameters.hint: Use to pass to a group of agents unassigned

input_parameters.name: add_followers
input_parameters.description: Enter internal agent emails to be added
input_parameters.title: Add followers

input_parameters.name: remove_followers
input_parameters.description: Enter internal agent emails to be removed
input_parameters.title: Remove followers

input_parameters.name: add_cc_emails
input_parameters.description: Enter external email CCs to be added
input_parameters.title: Add email CCs
input_parameters.hint: Only updated with public reply

input_parameters.name: remove_cc_emails
input_parameters.description: Enter external email CCs to be removed
input_parameters.title: Remove email CCs
input_parameters.hint: Only updated with public reply

variables.name: ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN
variables.title: Zendesk subdomain
variables.description: Enter the subdomain for your Zendesk instance
variables.hint: Example: `internal` if your instance is https://internal.zendesk.com

functions.title: Create new physical card
functions.description: Create an async task to request for new physical card.

input_parameters.name: amount_limit
input_parameters.title: Amount
input_parameters.hint: Total amount limit per interval

input_parameters.name: interval
input_parameters.title: Frequency
input_parameters.hint: Time interval to apply limit to

input_parameters.name: primary_card_enabled
input_parameters.title: Allow spending with physical card
input_parameters.hint: Allow employees to link their physical card, if they have one, to the issued Virtual Card.

input_parameters.name: reimbursements_enabled
input_parameters.title: Allow spending through reimbursement
input_parameters.hint: Give employees the flexibility to use their own payment methods and submit reimbursements against the issued card’s limit.

input_parameters.name: issue_physical_card_if_needed
input_parameters.title: Issue physical card if employee doesn’t have one
input_parameters.hint: A physical card tied to this Virtual Card will be issued to employees who don’t have one yet. Takes 5–7 business days to arrive.

input_parameters.name: amount_limit
input_parameters.title: Amount
input_parameters.hint: Total amount limit per interval. Currently we expect the currency to be USD and the amount needs to be denominated in cents.

input_parameters.name: interval
input_parameters.title: Interval
input_parameters.hint: Time interval to apply limit to

functions.title: Create new virtual card
functions.description: Create an async task to request for new virtual card.

input_parameters.name: amount_limit
input_parameters.title: Amount
input_parameters.hint: Total amount limit per interval

input_parameters.name: interval
input_parameters.title: Frequency
input_parameters.hint: Time interval to apply limit to

functions.title: Suspend a card
functions.description: Suspend a card so that it is locked from use. This action is reversible.

functions.title: Terminate a card
functions.description: Terminate a card permanently. This action is irreversible.

functions.title: Unlock a card
functions.description: Remove a card's suspension so that it may be used again.
